ComicInfo.Summary:
Old friends better run, because Operation PATIENCE! CONVICTION! REVENGE! is underway. Renny wakes up on the sidewalk with a thirst for payback, and an Organization-controlled water treatment facility is his target of choice. But the locals see him as just another interloper and soon he's drawn into Vegas-slum class warfare! Meanwhile, Robot Paul learns casino life isn't all it's cracked up to be.
Written by Patrick Kindlon (There's Nothing There, We Can Never Go Home) and drawn by Marco Ferrari (Famous Monsters Presents), PATIENCE! CONVICTION! REVENGE! continues Kindlon's exploration of difficult characters and irreverent themes.
